data.title: About us
data.content: In InstaBlogs you can see experiences about other freelancers and also, you can share your own experience as a independent freelancer or for a company. Also, you can find tips, opinions, projects, tools, all this and more in our blog. Our objetive is create a community and a site where all independent professionals are welcome and exchange and share experiencies, so be polite :)

data.title: Team meets
data.content: Perhaps on this site you will find future coworkers, or even workplaces with opportunities for you if you want to start in a company or change it! The function of InstaBlogs is also to form experiences between you, projects, teams, and contacts that can benefit you even more professionally.
